comment.body: This issue is stale because it has been open for 90 days with no activity. It will be closed if no further action occurs in 14 days.

```suggestion
      it("returns a config object that includes the provided public access token and a null private access token", () => {
```

Think this might be a typo after refactoring - header checks seem further down.

comment.body:
Thoughts on leaning on the URL API here? We could skip the trim, cleanup and `endsWith` check further down.

```js
const { host: domain } = new URL("https://test.myshopify.com/ ")
console.log(domain) // => test.myshopify.com
```

commits.message: Fix import in rest/load-rest-resources

comment.body: Let's aim to use the main linting rules so we can remove this unless there's something very specific we'd need to set for our this particular package (eg. for the SFAPI client, I'll need to set `@typescript-eslint/ban-ts-comment` rule to `off` because I need the `// ts-ignore` in the tests to test some of the validation.

issue.title: Types in order and product dont match the real world rest api and miss clarity in some cases

commits.message: Use the correct hmac header
Prototyping typed GQL queries without AST nodes
Prototyping typed GQL queries without AST nodes
Add scaffolding code for GraphQL Client package
Fix eslint and tsconfigs
Add missing rollup, eslint and prettier files
Add unit tests and renamed files
Add CI test command
Removed custom eslint and prettier configs and fixed resulting linting issues
Update rollup configs and separate build umd files
Address PR review comments, updated tests and removed unused code
Add changeset
Update UMD file paths in package.json
Update graphql client readme

Merge pull request #1008 from Shopify/ml-graphql-client-package

[Feature] Add GraphQL Client package
Removed unnecessary shopify-api change

Merge pull request #1013 from Shopify/ml-update-gql-client-changeset

Removed unnecessary shopify-api change

Update error message thrown when path is not found

Multiple reports of folks getting errors that they dont know how to resolve when missing IDs
Fix LATEST_API_VERSION export

Merge pull request #1018 from Shopify/fix_latest_version

Fix LATEST_API_VERSION export
Add the retries feature to the graphql-client
Removed support for retry-after header and added maximum retries check
